bio: I was born in Istanbul on November 8, 1999. After completing my elementary school here, I started my high school life at Antalya Karatay Anatolian High School. I started web programming applications besides the lectures in the numerical department in I was in high school. After high school, I qualified to enter the Burdur Mehmet Akif Ersoy University Computer Engineer department. I studied preparation for a foreign language. I am now a 4th-grade student. I am particularly interested in software development, and web development.
shortBio: I am a 4th-year student at Burdur Mehmet Akif Ersoy University Computer Engineering department. I am particularly interested in software development, and web development.
testimonialEnginDemirog: I can proudly say that Ahmet is a 'wanted' developer who can apply the techniques used in corporate projects and can handle any kind of project...
